trans-unit.target: TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_1<tab>Welcome to the Mizzenmast Inn! Fledglin' adventurer, are ye?

TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_2<tab>I'm sorry, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, but I can't let ye stay until Baderon gives his say-so. Ye just keep workin' away, and I'm sure he'll add yer name to me list afore long! Gah hah hah!
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_Q1_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A1_000_1<tab>Ask about the Mizzenmast Inn.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A1_000_2<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_3<tab>The Mizzenmast Inn is a place where visitors to Limsa come to rest their weary heads.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_4<tab>Our soft beds and wide chambers are a damn sight more comfortable than a swingin' hammock in some cramped, fish-stinkin' cabin!
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_5<tab>But we're a bit picky about our clientele, ye see, and so I can only offer rooms to them what got the seal of approval from Baderon himself.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_6<tab>Ye keep makin' a difference for folks here in Limsa, though, and ye'll be beddin' down here in the Mizzenmast afore long! Gah hah hah!

TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_10<tab>Greetin's, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. What can I do for ye this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evenin')) ((mornin')) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evenin')) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_Q2_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A2_000_1<tab>Retire to an inn room.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A2_000_2<tab>Ask about <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A2_000_3<tab>Ask about inn rules.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A2_000_4<tab>Ask about the Mizzenmast Inn.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_A2_000_5<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_11<tab>Have a nice rest! Gah hah hah!

TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_12<tab>Ye can come and go any time ye please. Our beds are the softest in the land, and I guarantee ye'll sleep like a babe at <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mother's warm teat.

TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_SYSTEM_000_13<tab>Entering an inn room grants a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status. This indicates that you are gradually accumulating a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rested bonus<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Should you log out from inside an inn room, the process will continue while you are offline.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_SYSTEM_000_14<tab>While a rested bonus is in effect, experience points earned through combat, synthesis, and gathering are increased by 50%.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_SYSTEM_000_15<tab>When you gain experience, your rested bonus will decrease proportionally.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_SYSTEM_000_16<tab>Once your accumulated rested bonus disappears completely, the amount of experience you gain will revert to normal.

TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_17<tab>Rules? I've just <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> rule in me establishment, and that's no craftin'. Me patrons don't want to be kept up all night listenin' to you waxin' hafts, burnishin' brass, or poundin' steel.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>Synthesis, repairs, and materia melding cannot be performed inside inn rooms.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_19<tab>The Mizzenmast Inn is a place where visitors to Limsa come to rest their weary heads.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_20<tab>Our soft beds and wide chambers are a damn sight more comfortable than a swingin' hammock in some cramped, fish-stinkin' cabin!
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_21<tab>Ye can take a quiet moment to reflect on yer day, and sleep soundly without the fear o' rollin' waves upsettin' yer belly.
TEXT_WARPINNLIMSALOMINSA_MYTESYN_000_22<tab>And I'd wager a busy adventurer like yerself needs that sliver o' peace from time to time.
